Create EdgeR Object

Source: R/create_edger_obj.R
create_edger_obj.Rd

Utility function that using the screenR-class object create the corresponding edgeR object

create_edger_obj(screenR_Object)

Arguments

screenR_Object

The ScreenR object obtained using the create_screenr_object

Value

The edgeR object

Examples

object <- get0("object", envir = asNamespace("ScreenR"))
create_edger_obj(object)
#> An object of class "DGEList"
